alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 1:55AM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 43.0 feet, access to Eureka Landing community is cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 38.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late Saturday evening and rise to a crest of 45.8 feet Tuesday morning. The river will slowly fall on Wednesday but remains above flood stage. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
